page.description: Easily add vertical lines separating columns using List Column Separators.

discussion.p: You can add separator lines between columns in a List by adding List Column Separators.

description.p: You can specify the color and the thickness of the lines.
To turn on column separators, edit the List and in the *[ui:Layout Properties]* section check the *[ui:Has column separator lines]* property. (This property is only shown for *[ui:Column]* layouts)
You can then click the smart field for the *[ui:Column separator properties]* option to set the column separator properties.

item.name: Color
item.description: The color of the line. Default is *[css:gray]*.

item.name: Thickness
item.description: The width of the line in pixels. Default is 1.

section.title: Toggling List Separator Lines Using JavaScript

description.p: You can programmatically toggle the state of the column separators using this method:

p.example: var l = {dialog.object}.getControl('list1'); //get pointer to List object l.columnSeparators('on');
